IodéOS apps

This is a repository of iodéOS apps to be used with F-Droid.

Currently it serves 12 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iodeOS/fdroid/master/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
EC 43 61 0D 9A CC A5 D2 42 6E B2 D5 EB 74 33 19 30 01 4D E7 9D 3C 3A CB C1 7D FE 58 AA 12 60 5F
